prompt: Do you offer free shipping? ->
completion: I'm sorry

prompt: What is your returns policy? ->
completion: I'm sorry to hear that you need to return something. Please login and go to the accounts section and click on returns. Fill in the returns form and leave the delivery outside your house

prompt: I am unable to login to my account what should I do? ->
completion: Please check that you are using the correct email address and password. If you have forgotten your password you can reset it by clicking on the "Forgot password" link on the login page. If you are still having trouble please contact our customer support team on 07931 7786303 for further assistance.

prompt: You dropped my delivery on my neighbour's roof. ->
completion: Is it possible to get access to the roof? Could you ask your neighbour if you can have it back. We normally find neighbours are happy to take in orders for clients.

prompt: My package is missing. A drone was seen in the area but package was not delivered. ->
completion: Oh dear. That doesn't sound like something I can help with here. Can you please email our customer service team at help@we-wingit.com.

prompt: My parcel was dropped off at the wrong address by the drone and I cannot find it. ->
completion: I do apologise. Sometimes our drones get confused. Please contact customer support by emailing help@we-wingit.com .

prompt: When will I get my order? ->
completion: Please track your order with the tracking number provided in your order confirmation email.

prompt: How much is insurance for your service? ->
completion: It's a flat rate of £3.75 per drone order.

prompt: The drone crashed while delivering my package ->
completion: and my china tea set was damaged.

prompt: I waited in all day and the drone didn't come! I want a refund! ->
completion: I apologise for your wasted day! Sometimes our drones have to be taken out of service due to adverse weather conditions or mechanical problems.

prompt: One of your drones flew over my garden and scared my chickens! What the hell is going on? ->
completion: I am sorry to hear your poultry were scared by our drone! But I'm afraid the Civil Aviation Authority have licensed to fly over residential areas so I can't guarantee it won't happen again.

prompt: I was waiting for my new laptop but the delivery was cancelled with no explanation! I demand answers. ->
completion: I do apologise. We should have contacted you to arrange another time. Please email help@we-wingit.com and we will credit your account with £20 as compensation.

prompt: Your drones are noisy! They wake up my babies! ->
completion: Are you sure you heard our drones? We use ultra quiet Whisper Technology - our drones are virtually silent.

prompt: Your drone couldn't find my house. I live on a farm about two miles off the road. What can I do? ->
completion: Ah if we can't find your house from your postcode or zip code we can usually work with map coordinates. This will have to be arranged by email. Pleas email help@we-wingit.com .

prompt: Your drone dropped a bag of rice on my pet poodle! She almost died. ->
completion: I do hope that your poodle is OK! Our drones are trained to avoid animals but this is not infallible. Please accept our apologies.

prompt: I'm getting worried because my package was supposed to be delivered by drone this morning but it still hasn't arrived. ->
completion: I'm sorry to hear that. Sometimes drones can be delayed by severe weather or mechanical problems. If it hasn't arrived by 8pm tonight

prompt: Hey ->
completion: my drone delivery was supposed to be here by now but I haven't seen it. What's the delay?

prompt: What material are your drones made out of? ->
completion: I don't know the answer to that question.

prompt: What is your phone number? ->
completion: You can contact us on 07931 7786303 but we prefer it if people only phone us in an emergency. We are here from 9am to 6pm weekdays. But email is a better way to contact us. help@we-wingit.com .

prompt: Why don't you answer your phone? ->
completion: Our phones are open from 9-6 every weekday but we are very busy. Can I help?

prompt: I want to send 2 parcels. One parcel weighs 2kg ->
completion: and the other weights 4kg. How much will that cost?

prompt: Your delivery service seems rather expensive! ->
completion: Well

prompt: How much does your service cost? ->
completion: We charge £20 for each drone and £2 per kg of weight. Each drone can carry a maximum of 5kg.

prompt: Who is your press officer? ->
completion: I'm sorry

prompt: I want to complain to the manager! ->
completion: Oh dear. You sound unhappy. The best thing to do is to email help@we-wingit.com with your complaint. I am sorry we have not managed to satisfy you on this occasion.

prompt: I demand to speak to the chief executive. I don't want to speak to some AI bot! ->
completion: OK

prompt: My drone delivery was supposed to arrive yesterday ->
completion: but it never came. Can you help me figure out what's going on?

prompt: I received a notification that my parcel was delivered ->
completion: but I haven't received anything. Can you help me find out what happened?

prompt: I received the wrong item! I was expecting a toy trainset ->
completion: not fairy lights!

prompt: I need to change my delivery address ->
completion: but it won't let me do it online as I have a delivery due within the next 24 hours.

prompt: Can I send an anonymous Valentine's card by drone? ->
completion: Yes

prompt: Are your drones recyclable? ->
completion: I'm really sorry

prompt: Hey! ->
completion: Hi there! How can I help you?

prompt: Are you there? ->
completion: Yes

I was out when your drove delivered and someone stole my delivery.

 Customer: I didn't have insurance. Will you deliver me a replacement product? 
Agent: ->
completion: Have you read our terms and conditions? This kind of problem will arise when delivering with drones. That's why we recommend insurance. Without insurance

Customer: Can't you track it? 
Agent: Sorry ->
completion: we can't track our drones. They fly too low for radar. \nCustomer: Well
